response_requirements.initial_response_description: Should not exceed 20 calendar days. Ordinarily should not exceed 10 business days. No set expiration date by which request is considered denied.
response_requirements.no_response_consequence: File complaint with Iowa Public Information Board within 60 days

fee_structure.standard_copy_fee: Reasonable fees for copying and processing, cannot exceed actual costs
fee_structure.search_time_fee: Supervising examination of records - actual costs only
waiver_criteria: Some records (like veterans benefit claims) must be provided free
fee_structure.notes: Cannot include overhead or administrative costs. Fees must be reasonable expenses directly attributable to supervising, making copies, or providing copies.

exemptions.description: Personal information in confidential personnel records (discretionary)
Trade secrets and confidential commercial information (discretionary)
Attorney work product and privileged communications (discretionary)
Law enforcement investigative reports for ongoing investigations (discretionary)
Records required to be kept confidential by federal law (discretionary)
Computer software developed by government agency (discretionary)
Security procedures and emergency response plans (discretionary)

appeal_process.appeal_description: File complaint with IPIB within 60 days of alleged violation. IPIB investigates and issues determination. Further appeal to district court available.

penalties.civil: Court may award attorney's fees and costs in some cases. Officials may face removal from office for violations.

requester_requirements.specific_format: No specific form required. Can be made in writing, by telephone, electronically, or in person. Must be directed to lawful custodian.
requester_requirements.notes: No requirement to state purpose. No residency requirement. No restrictions on use of records obtained.

specific_obligations: Post information about record request procedures
Redact confidential information from otherwise public records

oversight_body.name: Iowa Public Information Board
oversight_body.role: Enforces Iowa's sunshine laws, handles complaints, issues formal opinions
oversight_body.contact_info: 510 E 12th Street, Jessie Parker Building, Des Moines, IA 50319. Phone: (515) 393-8339
enforcement_powers: Recommend removal of officials from office

validation_metadata.verification_notes: Parsed from official statutory text file. Response time verified against canonical-values.json (90 business days - note statute uses 'should not exceed 20 calendar days ordinarily 10 business days' standard). 9 discretionary exemptions parsed from statute.
